body:
The activated ability of a card like Nantuko Shade is only used once per phase even in situations where using it more often would result in:
- winning the round
- prevent losing the round
- prevent Nantuko Shade from being destroyed

Tested with current version and a version before the refactoring of cards into separate classes.

I'll push a TestNantukoShade class that demonstrates the bug.
